problem.markdown:
>>Developed countries like Italy and Germany tend to have a(n) ______ -shaped age structure diagram.<< () ⬥ (diamond) (x) ▼ (upside-down triangle) () O (oval) () ▲ (pyramid) () ▢ (rectangle)
[explanation] Developed countries in phase four of the demographic transition tend to have inverted-triangle shaped age diagrams, as their populations are declining (replacement level fertility is below 2). Their population is characterized by fewer young people and a greater number of older people. [explanation]
problem.p: Developed countries like Italy and Germany tend to have a(n) ______ -shaped age structure diagram.

choicegroup.label: Developed countries like Italy and Germany tend to have a(n) ______ -shaped age structure diagram.

div.p: Developed countries in phase four of the demographic transition tend to have inverted-triangle shaped age diagrams, as their populations are declining (replacement level fertility is below 2). Their population is characterized by fewer young people and a greater number of older people.
